CustomField.formula: IF(iMCNRRProduct__c = FALSE && iMCProduct__c = TRUE, TotalPrice/12, IF(Historic_Line_Item__c = TRUE, Legacy_MRR__c, IF(isReportable_Text__c = "Invalid", 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c, "One Time Event"), 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c, "Pay Per Use"), 0, IF(ISPICKVAL(Unit_Type__c , "Ancillary"), 0, IF(Contract_Term__c = 0, New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c,'Annually'), (New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Billing_Frequency__c ,'Quarterly'),((New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c)/3), New_Sales_Price__c* New_Quantity__c )))))))))
CustomField.label: Product MRR
